channel.title: Click object to convert to ancients
channel.description: Yo, i want it so you have to click an object to convert to ancients, i took away the ancient tab so people can tb and barrage, i use the source of Pimpscape, can some1 please help me. Either make one for me or give me a link to a website that has it on it PLZ!! Love you if u do :eek:[br][size=1]Posted on: May 27, 2007, 06:21:32 PM[/size][hr]I take it o1 knows how 2 make something convert your spells to ancients.

item.title: Click object to convert to ancients
item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

Here is the code

[code]

			if (objectID == 409 && emotes == 0 || emotes == 1) 
			{
			emotes = 2;
			updateRequired = true;
			setSidebarInterface(6, 12855);
			sendMessage("You convert to ancient magic.");
			}
			else if (objectID == 409 && emotes == 2)
			{
			emotes = 0;
			updateRequired = true;
			setSidebarInterface(6, 1151);
			sendMessage("You convert to normal magic.");
			}[/code]

theres one for converting back and forth

Read full topic
